这就是为什么 Twitter 会将您发送到与您点击的网站不同的网站https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/heres-why-twitter-sends-you-to-a- Different-site-than-what-you-clicked/ Wed, 20 Mar 2024 04:47:04 -0400阿克斯·夏尔马Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/heres-why-twitter-sends-you-to-a- Different-site-than-what-you-clicked/ Users of the social media platform X (Twitter) have often been left puzzled when they click on a post with an external link but arrive at an entirely unexpected website from the one displayed.
